headline: Barclays Upgrades Williams-Sonoma (WSM) to Equal Weight, Lifts PT to $166
summary: Barclays upgraded Williams-Sonoma Inc. (NYSE:WSM) from Underweight to Equal Weight on Monday, while increasing its price target from $131 to $166. While Barclays remains concerned about the macroeconomic environment for big-ticket items, it anticipates less risk to Williams-Sonoma’s FY2025 earnings and doesn’t expect the company’s fundamentals to underperform other discretionary stocks. The analyst noted stable […]

headline: Pottery Barn plans to expand to the UK this fall
summary: In addition to an e-commerce presence in the region, the home furnishings retailer will also offer its personalized design services.

headline: One of the Newest Stocks in the S&P 500 Has Soared 33,150% Since Its IPO, and It's Still a Buy Right Now, According to a Certain Wall Street Analyst
summary: This company is a standout performer with a long track record of growth.
